    • Method Detail

      • beanResolver

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder beanResolver(GekBeanResolver beanResolver)
        Sets bean resolver for copy operation. Default is null, in this case the operation will use GekBeanResolver.defaultResolver().
        Parameters:
        beanResolver - bean resolver
        Returns:
        this builder

      • converter

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder converter(GekConverter converter)
        Sets object converter for copy operation. Default is null, in this case the operation will use GekConverter.defaultConverter().
        Parameters:
        converter - converter
        Returns:
        this builder

      • throwIfConvertFailed

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder throwIfConvertFailed(boolean throwIfConvertFailed)
        Sets whether throws GekConvertException if conversion operation was failed. Default is false, means ignore failed properties.
        Parameters:
        throwIfConvertFailed - whether throws GekConvertException if conversion operation was failed
        Returns:
        this builder

      • propertyNameMapper

        public <T> GekBeanCopier.Builder propertyNameMapper(java.util.function.Function<T,T> propertyNameMapper)
        Sets property name mapper, to map property names from source object to dest object. The property will be ignored if new name is null or not found in dest bean.

        For common bean object, type of property names is always String; for map object, key types is any type.

        Note:

        • Type of property name/key must same before and after mapping;
        • The new property name/key after mapping still needs to be converted by the converter into the final property name/key to be used.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of name
        Parameters:
        propertyNameMapper - property name mapper
        Returns:
        this builder

      • sourcePropertyFilter

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder sourcePropertyFilter(java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> sourcePropertyFilter)
        Sets source property filter, the first param is name of source property, second is value of source property value.

        Only the property that pass through this filter (return true) will be copied from.

        Parameters:
        sourcePropertyFilter - source property filter
        Returns:
        this builder

      • destPropertyFilter

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder destPropertyFilter(java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> destPropertyFilter)
        Sets dest property filter, the first param is name of dest property, second is converted value of source property (maybe null) that is prepared to copy.

        Only the property that pass through this filter (return true) will be copied from.

        Parameters:
        destPropertyFilter - dest property filter
        Returns:
        this builder

      • putIfNotContained

        public GekBeanCopier.Builder putIfNotContained(boolean putIfNotContained)
        Sets whether put the property into dest map if dest map doesn't contain corresponding property. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        putIfNotContained - whether put the property into dest map
        Returns:
        this builder
